Blow-Dry Mist 3.4oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Mist dramatically decreases blow-dry time up to 50% and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. This ultra-light-weight formula detangles, smooths, and softens while eliminating frizz and resisting humidity for long-lasting, healthy looking results.

Blow-Dry Spray 1.7oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray dramatically decreases blow-dry time up to 50% and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. This lightweight formula detangles, smooths, and softens while eliminating frizz and resisting humidity for long-lasting, healthy looking results.

Blow-Dry Spray 3.4oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray dramatically decreases blow-dry time up to 50% and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. This lightweight formula detangles, smooths, and softens while eliminating frizz and resisting humidity for long-lasting, healthy looking results.

Blow-Dry Spray 6.8oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray dramatically decreases blow-dry time up to 50% and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. This lightweight formula detangles, smooths, and softens while eliminating frizz and resisting humidity for long-lasting, healthy looking results.

Pearl Detangler 5.4oz.product_description_long: Live life tangle-free. Kenra Platinum Pearl Detangler is a milky detangling spray, with luminescent pearl, that adds moisture, slip, and shine for effortless manageability. Helps protect against thermal damage, unlocking remarkable radiance.

Perfect Medium Spray 13 1.5oz.product_description_long: Kenra Perfect Medium Spray 13 combines buildable control with a touchable, brush-through hold. This medium hold spray is fast-drying and finishes with high shine.

Dry Texture Spray 6 1.5oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Dry Texture Spray 6 improves texture and fullness while absorbing oils and impurities. This ultra-lightweight, non-drying formulation leaves the hair with a matte finish and provides flexible hold.

Dry Texture Spray 6 5.3oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Dry Texture Spray 6 improves texture and fullness while absorbing oils and impurities. This ultra-lightweight, non-drying formulation leaves the hair with a matte finish and provides flexible hold.

Design Spray 9 10oz.product_description_long: Kenra Design Spray 9 provides ultimate style versatility and memory hold. This light hold styling spray leaves hair moveable, touchable, and full of body and shine.

Finishing Spray 26 10oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Finishing Spray 26 is the ultimate firm hold hairspray, providing maximum control with long-lasting lift and style retention. Its fast drying, humidity resistant formula finishes styles with high shine, and is completely shampoo soluble.

Perfect Medium Spray 13 10oz.product_description_long: Kenra Perfect Medium Spray 13 combines buildable control with a touchable, brush-through hold. This medium hold spray is fast-drying and finishes with high shine.

Silkening Gloss 2.26oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Silkening Gloss is a lightweight formula for silky, lustrous hair.

Texturizing Taffy 13 2oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Texturizing Taffy 13 creates seperation and texture with a soft, moveable feel. For flexible styling without stiffness. This sculpting taffy has a pliable formula that creates superior memory and control.

Thermal Styling Spray 19 10.1oz.product_description_long: Shape and hold hair styles with curling irons, hot rollers, and flat irons with Kenra Thermal Styling Spray 19. This non-sticking thermal protecting spray prevents hair damage by permitting a clean release from styling tools.

Ultra Freeze Spray 30 10oz.product_description_long: Kenra Ultra Freeze Spray 30 locks styles in place with a long-lasting, ultra-firm hold. This fast-drying formula defines, sculpts and freezes styles in place, while providing humidity resistance with a high shine, flake-free finish.

Volume Spray 25 1.5oz.product_description_long: Kenra Volume Spray 25 provides up to 120-hour super hold and 72-hour high humidity resistance. This award-winning hairspray is fast-drying, with a flake-free finish, and wind resistant up to 25 MPH. Provides thermal protection up to 450°F/232°C. *vs. untreated hair in high humidity conditions

Volume Spray 25 10oz.product_description_long: Kenra Volume Spray 25 provides up to 120-hour super hold and 72-hour high humidity resistance. This award-winning hairspray is fast-drying, with a flake-free finish, and wind resistant up to 25 MPH. Provides thermal protection up to 450°F/232°C. *vs. untreated hair in high humidity condition

Volume Spray 25 16oz.product_description_long: Kenra Volume Spray 25 provides up to 120-hour super hold and 72-hour high bumidity resistance. This award-winning hairspray is fast-drying, with a flake-free finish, and wind resistant up to 25 MPH. Provides thermal protection up to 450°F/232°C. *vs. untreated hair in high humidity conditions

Thickening Mousse 12 6.7oz.product_description_long: Kenra Platinum Texturizing Mist 6 is an ultra-lightweight mist that boosts texture and fullness and is humidity resistant for up to 24 hours. This flake-free, non-drying formula provides defined texture and versatility with brushable, touchable hold and a matte finish.

Volume Mousse 12 8oz.product_description_long: Kenra Volume Mousse 12 provides medium hold and controls hair without stiffness or stickiness. Its lightweight, conditioning formulation leaves all hair types shiny and manageable. Perfect for blow-drying styling.
